title: Great Porter Square (Somerville) 3 Bedroom
posting_body: For the most up to date information, visit: <URL>
Rent Directly From RCG and Pay No Fee!
This is for an apartment rental.
RCG does not rent by the room.
Available for lease beginning 9/1/22  Ideally located 3BR apartment with large eat-in-kitchen, spacious living room, and bonus fully enclosed three season porch!
Features include hardwood floors, in-unit laundry, large bedrooms with high ceilings, loads of natural sunlight, and much more.
This property is located steps to the many shops, restaurants, and the Red Line T in Porter Square.
87 and 83 bus at the end of the block.
